events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred on 2024-04-29 involving rear-end collision on Main St.
The claim was categorized as an auto accident based on the initial description of the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and claim process.
Acknowledgment sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Requested the claimant to provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and medical bills if any.
The claimant submitted the police report, photos of the collision damage, and initial repair estimates.
Investigation commenced to verify details of the collision and assess liability and extent of vehicle damage.
Completed investigation confirming collision details and validated damages as consistent with submitted evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover vehicle repairs and related expenses based on the assessment report.
Customer provided feedback expressing acceptance of the settlement proposal and appreciation for the agentâ€™s support.
Claim officially approved by the claims manager following review of all documentation and customer acceptance.
Payment for the approved claim amount was issued to the claimant to cover all authorized vehicle repairs.
Closed the claim file after confirming payment receipt and claimant satisfaction with the resolution.
Archived all records related to the auto accident claim for future reference and regulatory compliance.
